description:
**Problem**
Host-coupled commands (`admin`, `store`, `upgrade`, `migrate`) remain anchored in `beads-rs` due backend/runtime coupling. This is the main blocker for finishing CLI ownership transfer.

**Design**
Define typed backend seams in `beads-cli` for host-coupled operations, then migrate command handlers into `beads-cli` while preserving crate DAG boundaries (`beads-cli` must not depend on forbidden layers).

**Acceptance**
- [ ] `admin`, `store`, `upgrade`, and `migrate` command handling logic is moved to `beads-cli`.
- [ ] Backend trait boundaries are explicit and enforced by compile-time types.
- [ ] No forbidden dependency edges are introduced (validated with `just dylint` and crate DAG checks).
- [ ] Existing admin/store/upgrade behavior and output are preserved.
- [ ] Full verification gate passes (`fmt`, `dylint`, `clippy`, `test`, `slow-tests`).

**Files**
- crates/beads-cli/src/commands/admin.rs
- crates/beads-cli/src/commands/store.rs
- crates/beads-cli/src/commands/upgrade.rs
- crates/beads-cli/src/commands/migrate.rs
- crates/beads-rs/src/cli/backend.rs
- crates/beads-rs/src/cli/commands/{admin,store,upgrade,migrate}.rs
title: Migrate admin/store/upgrade/migrate handlers behind beads-cli backend seams
